# PiltLibChat

League of Legends chat **web interface** and **modules to use the chat programmatically**.

# Modules
More information and examples for each module can be found in the modules readme file (`README.md`).

- [x] jid
- [ ] leaguedata
- [x] status
- [x] client
- [x] uid
